content.text:
# Draft:1905–06 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

}}
The 1905–06 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 18th season of existence and their 7th season in the Southern League Division One, the top non-league division of football in England at the time. Qpr also competed in the 1905–06 Western Football League.
Season summary
In the 1905–06 season QPR continued play in the Southern League Division One and Finished 13th whilst in the Western league, Qpr won Division 1
Southern League Division One
